name: Руководитель отдела информационных технологий
description:
Responsibilities:

  • IT department management
  • IT Budget planning and analyzing
  • Documentation of IT system configuration
  • Planning and carrying out works to expand enterprise LAN structure
  • Maintenance of the servers on MS Windows Server 2003/2008/2012
  • Installation and maintenance of hardware and software
  • Antivirus protection and network security
  • Maintenance and Programming Panasonic PBX
  • Maintenance and support of the virtual machines (Microsoft Hyper-V)
  • Setting up a local network and ensure optimal functioning
  • Maintenance of Backup systems
  • Maintenance of Cisco network equipment (switches, routers, proxy, Wi-Fi controllers)
  • Maintenance of videoconference and attendance system
  • Work on the corporate help desk portal as IT Level 2
  • Work on the segmentation of OT and IT networks

Requirements:

  • Higher education
  • Fluency in English, the level of intermediate
  • Good practical skills and theoretical knowledge on setting up and maintenance of computer equipment and software installation
  • Knowledge of the operating systems MS Windows Server and MS SQL server as system administrator level
  • Knowledge of ITIL principles
  • Good practical skills to work as Level 2 on the helpdesk portal
  • Knowledge of the virtualization technology (Hyper-V, VMware)
  • Knowledge of Alcatel PBX and Panasonic PBX programming
  • Experience with AD, DNS and mail servers as administrative level
  • Knowledge of OT network and OT equipment
  • Knowledge of the construction of LAN and VPN
  • Ability to work in a team
  • Knowledge of programming environment 1C v8
  • Communication skills, duty, responsibility, hard work, attention
  • Desire to understand the new for a software and hardware system

Working conditions:

  • Registration in accordance with the Labor Code of the Russian Federation
  • Completely "white" salary
  • Working hours 5/2 (from 09:00 to 18:00)
  • Free shuttle bus travel
  • Free meals
  • Social package
